welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wigston Magna! This charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom is known for its picturesque streets, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time or data limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nottingham Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Birmingham Airport primarily serves low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.
